column2: Planet Green Holdings Corp. engages in the development, manufacture and sale of food products. The company is headquartered in Linyi, Shandong and currently employs 2,471 full-time employees. The firm develops, manufactures and sells a range of food products, including Chestnut products, Convenience foods and Frozen food products. The firm operates through three segments: Chestnut products, Convenience food products and Frozen food products. The firm manufactures its products in approximately six facilities in China. The firm has four types of product lines: deep-freezing lines, which are used to freeze raw materials for year-round production and to produce frozen food; Canning lines, which are used to produce canned products, including chestnut products; Convenience food lines, which are used for producing ready-to-cook (RTC) food products, ready-to-eat (RTE) food products and meals ready-to- eat (MRE) food products, all of which have nitrogen preservation capacity, and Chinese doughnuts lines, which are used to produce Chinese doughnut products.
